simulation_metadata.simulation_title: Acting as an HR Manager on Day One
simulation_metadata.what_companies_look_for: Recruiters at companies like Infosys and Accenture look for proof that you can independently handle HR manager-level decisions from day one, not just support roles.

recruiter_readable_proof: CV Point: Acted as HR Manager handling business-critical decisions

primary_role_competencies_evaluated: Owning HR decisions end-to-end under limited guidance
Prioritising business impact alongside people considerations

scenarios.crisis_or_decision_trigger: A business unit head escalates that three critical roles have been open for 45+ days, delaying a ₹2.5 crore client project.
Two accepted candidates decline offers citing compensation ambiguity and slow communication.
scenarios.emotional_peak: Pressure from finance and business on cost vs speed

scenarios.crisis_or_decision_trigger: You are asked to present hiring risks and corrective actions in the weekly leadership review.
scenarios.emotional_peak: First senior leadership review as acting HR Manager

steps.instruction_or_question: Review the hiring dashboard and identify the single biggest blocker.

mentor_explanation.layman_explanation: You are scanning live hiring numbers to see where things are stuck — sourcing, interviews, or approvals.
mentor_explanation.answer_action: Spot the stage with the highest candidate drop-off and longest delay.

steps.artefact_interaction_description: Inspect the Hiring Funnel Metrics Dashboard to flag the bottleneck stage.
steps.artefact_ui_description: Funnel stages with counts, average days per stage, red highlights for SLA breaches. Timer: 30 seconds.
options_or_inputs: Sourcing volume is too low for niche roles
Candidates rejecting due to location constraints

outcomes.incorrect: Sourcing volume is too low for niche roles

steps.immediate_feedback: Correct choice helps recover ~₹40 lakh in potential project delay costs.
steps.bridge_content: With the bottleneck identified, leadership expects immediate corrective action.

steps.instruction_or_question: Decide your immediate corrective action as HR Manager.

mentor_explanation.layman_explanation: You must act fast to unblock hiring without blaming teams.
mentor_explanation.answer_action: Set a temporary SLA and escalation rule for interview feedback.

steps.artefact_interaction_description: Update rules within the Hiring Funnel Dashboard.
steps.artefact_ui_description: Toggle SLA rule, add escalation contact, confirmation animation on save. Timer: 20 seconds.
options_or_inputs: Escalate delays directly to BU head
Pause new sourcing until backlog clears

outcomes.partially_correct: Escalate delays directly to BU head
outcomes.incorrect: Pause new sourcing until backlog clears

steps.immediate_feedback: SLA action improves hiring velocity by ~18% within two weeks.
steps.bridge_content: Hiring velocity improves, but offer closures create a new issue.

steps.instruction_or_question: Respond to the declined offer situation.

mentor_explanation.layman_explanation: Candidates dropped out after saying yes — usually a trust or clarity issue.
mentor_explanation.answer_action: Clarify compensation structure and tighten approval communication.

steps.artefact_interaction_description: Draft a corrective response using the Offer Approval Tracker Email.
steps.artefact_ui_description: Email thread with editable subject, CC rules, read receipts. Timer: 45 seconds.
options_or_inputs: Ask recruiters to convince candidates informally
Send a transparent compensation breakup and approval timeline
Withdraw both offers to reset expectations

outcomes.correct: Send a transparent compensation breakup and approval timeline
outcomes.partially_correct: Ask recruiters to convince candidates informally
outcomes.incorrect: Withdraw both offers to reset expectations

steps.immediate_feedback: Correct response saves ~₹6 lakh in rehiring and agency costs.
steps.bridge_content: Leadership now wants a consolidated view of risks.

steps.instruction_or_question: Choose what to present in the leadership review.

mentor_explanation.layman_explanation: Leaders want clarity on risk, not operational noise.
mentor_explanation.answer_action: Summarise hiring risks with business impact and next actions.

steps.artefact_interaction_description: Edit the People Analytics Summary Slide.
steps.artefact_ui_description: Three-slide view: risks, impact numbers, next 30-day actions. Timer: 60 seconds.
options_or_inputs: Hiring risks mapped to revenue and delivery

outcomes.correct: Hiring risks mapped to revenue and delivery

steps.immediate_feedback: Leadership confidence increases; HR credibility strengthened for future decisions.
steps.bridge_content: The review sets expectations for your role going forward.

simulation.closing_statement: This is exactly the kind of situation HR Managers are judged on.
